song.englishname: If You'll Let Me Love You

english.segment1: i don't know what to do to ease your mind. i don't have the perfect word to make it fine. i'm not so qualified for sympathy. still i am not without love
english.segment2: psalm number four falls on your grieving ear. yes, i believe the peace of christ is near. and i am here in his name. you'd do the same, you'd do the same..
english.segment3: if you'll let me close. closer than a brother. if you'll let me love you. we'll sit here and cry
english.segment4: if you'll let me love (let me love you)
english.segment5: never failing, ever hoping. seeking to preserve. it always is giving. often beyond words. and when there's nothing left to say. love has a voice. in sorrow and in heartache. there's a greater joy
english.segment6: i don't know what to do to ease your mind. whatever pain you have i'd take as mine. if you'll let me love (let me love you).
